record.field:
Student Organization News

If you didn't gather round the coffee machine or water-tank with your fellow student organization members this week, you've probably missed some key information.

We're here to make sure you miss none of the gossip.

Communication is the key to success in any business.

- Lee Brown

NEW MEMBERS

We're super excited to present our three new members, freshly arrived this week in our offices.

Mark will be helping our beloved party team, he'll be taking care of your payroll, so be nice!

You'll be seeing Armando around the student house reception!

Martin will be doing our accounting

Give them a warm welcome!
